● eric li

designer + developer
eyli@princeton.edu

about

welcome. each of the projects here represents a unique slice of myself and my interests. together, they explore my attempts to meld computer science and design into one. some of my overall interests include time, the sharing economy, context awareness, machine learning, and generative design.

i am currently on leave from princeton university, where i was studying computer science with a minor in visual arts and engineering management systems. in my spare time, i enjoy reading, photography, music, and traveling.

let's explore together.
